commands.name: az network dns zone create
examples: az network dns zone create -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com
az network dns zone create -g MyResourceGroup -n books.mysite.com -p mysite.com
az network dns zone create -g MyResourceGroup -n books.mysite.com -p "/subscriptions/**67e2/resourceGroups/OtherRg/providers/Microsoft.Network/dnszones/mysite.com"

commands.name: az network dns zone delete
commands.summary: Delete a DNS zone. WARNING: All DNS records in the zone will also be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.
commands.syntax:
az network dns zone delete [--ids]
                           [--if-match]
                           [--name]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--yes]
examples: az network dns zone delete -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns zone export
commands.summary: Export a DNS zone as a DNS zone file.
examples: az network dns zone export -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com -f mysite_com_zone.txt

commands.name: az network dns zone import
commands.summary: Create a DNS zone using a DNS zone file.
examples: az network dns zone import -g MyResourceGroup -n MyZone -f /path/to/zone/file

commands.name: az network dns zone list
examples: az network dns zone list -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network dns zone show
commands.summary: Get a DNS zone. Retrieves the zone properties, but not the record sets within the zone.
examples: az network dns zone show -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network dns zone update
commands.summary: Update a DNS zone. Does not modify DNS records within the zone.
commands.syntax:
az network dns zone update [--add]
                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--ids]
                           [--if-match]
                           [--name]
                           [--remove]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--set]
                           [--subscription]
                           [--tags]
examples: az network dns zone update -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com --tags CostCenter=Marketing
